      static void createEmptyLeaderBoard()

      deleteLeague() method when called will delete a league and all the files associated with that league.
      static void displayLeaderboard(int leagueNum)
      displayLeaderboard() prints the leader board to default output and saves it to a "x_leaderboard.txt" file, 'x' being the league number.
      static void generateFixtures(int leagueNum, boolean needToMirror)
      generateFixtures() generates fixtures and saves fixtures to a file "x_fixtures.txt", 'x' being the league number.

      getNumOfParticipants() is used to read the x_participants.txt file to get the number of participants.
      static int getResult(java.lang.String team)
      getResult() gets and validates the input for the score from the user.
      static void Leagues(int idNumber)
      Leagues() method is used to manage admin's leagues.
      static int Login()
      Login() prompts user to input user name and password to login allowing three tries.
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      main() method calls the Login() method and if it doesn't return -1 it calls the Leagues() method.
      static java.lang.String mirrorFixture(java.lang.String s)
      mirrorFixture() reverses a string.
      static void orderLeaderBoard()
      orderLeaderBoard() sorts the leader board in descending order of points.
      static void Participants(int league)
      participants() number of participant as input outputs the teams/players to text file "x_participants.txt" 'x' being the league number
      static void processResults()
      processResults() scans the results to see which participant won the fixture, and calls the recordFixtureResultForAwayTeam() and recordFixtureResultForHomeTeam() to update the leader board values.

      readFilesIntoArrayLists() loads participants, fixtures and results files into memory as three different ArrayLists.

      recordFixtureResultForAwayTeam() adds results to leader board for the away team.

      recordFixtureResultForHomeTeam() adds results to leader board for the home team.
      static void updateLeagueFile()
      updateLeagueFile() method when called updates the Leagues.txt file to have the up to date list of leagues.
      static void updateResults(int leagueNum)
      updateResults() is used to change or add results to fixtures by calling the getResult() method to validate input, and then saves the results to "x_results.txt" file, 'x' being the league number.

      • Login

        public static int Login()
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Login() prompts user to input user name and password to login allowing three tries.
        Returns:
        Returns id number if logged in successfully otherwise returns -1.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

        public static void updateLeagueFile()
                             throws java.io.IOException
        updateLeagueFile() method when called updates the Leagues.txt file to have the up to date list of leagues.

                         throws java.io.IOException

        java.io.IOException

      • Participants

        public static void Participants(int league)
                         throws java.io.IOException
        participants() number of participant as input outputs the teams/players to text file "x_participants.txt" 'x' being the league number
        Parameters:
        league - This is the number of the league to which user is adding the participants.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • generateFixtures

        public static void generateFixtures(int leagueNum,
                                    boolean needToMirror)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        generateFixtures() generates fixtures and saves fixtures to a file "x_fixtures.txt", 'x' being the league number.
        Parameters:
        leagueNum - League number for which the fixtures are generated.
        needToMirror - If fixtures need to be mirrored.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • mirrorFixture

        public static java.lang.String mirrorFixture(java.lang.String s)
        mirrorFixture() reverses a string.
        Parameters:
        s - A string to be reversed.
        Returns:
        Returns the reverse of s.

      • getNumOfParticipants

        public static int getNumOfParticipants(int league)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        getNumOfParticipants() is used to read the x_participants.txt file to get the number of participants.
        Parameters:
        league - League number for which to get number of participants.
        Returns:
        Returns the number of participants in the given league.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • updateResults

        public static void updateResults(int leagueNum)
                          throws java.io.IOException
        updateResults() is used to change or add results to fixtures by calling the getResult() method to validate input, and then saves the results to "x_results.txt" file, 'x' being the league number.
        Parameters:
        leagueNum - League number for which you are inputing results.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readFilesIntoArrayLists

        public static boolean readFilesIntoArrayLists(int leagueNum)
                                       throws java.io.IOException
        readFilesIntoArrayLists() loads participants, fixtures and results files into memory as three different ArrayLists.
        Parameters:
        leagueNum - League number of the files to be loaded.
        Returns:
        Returns true if all files exist and are loaded.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getResult

        public static int getResult(java.lang.String team)
        getResult() gets and validates the input for the score from the user.
        Parameters:
        team - Used to specify if it is home team or away team.
        Returns:
        Returns the score input as an integer or returns 0 if user clicks cancel.

      • createEmptyLeaderBoard

        public static void createEmptyLeaderBoard()
        createEmptyLeaderBoard() initializes a 2D integer array to store the leader board

      • processResults

        public static void processResults()
                           throws java.io.IOException
        processResults() scans the results to see which participant won the fixture, and calls the recordFixtureResultForAwayTeam() and recordFixtureResultForHomeTeam() to update the leader board values.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • recordFixtureResultForHomeTeam

        public static void recordFixtureResultForHomeTeam(int hTN,
                                                  int w,
                                                  int d,
                                                  int l,
                                                  int hTS,
                                                  int aTS,
                                                  int p)
        recordFixtureResultForHomeTeam() adds results to leader board for the home team.
        Parameters:
        hTN - Home team number.
        w - Adds value to the win column.
        d - Adds value to the draw column.
        l - Adds value to the lose column.
        hTS - Adds value to the home team score column.
        aTS - Adds value to the away team score column.
        p - Adds value to the score column.

      • recordFixtureResultForAwayTeam

        public static void recordFixtureResultForAwayTeam(int aTN,
                                                  int w,
                                                  int d,
                                                  int l,
                                                  int hTS,
                                                  int aTS,
                                                  int p)
        recordFixtureResultForAwayTeam() adds results to leader board for the away team.
        Parameters:
        aTN - Away team number.
        w - Adds value to the win column.
        d - Adds value to the draw column.
        l - Adds value to the lose column.
        hTS - Adds value to the home team score column.
        aTS - Adds value to the away team score column.
        p - Adds value to the score column.

      • orderLeaderBoard

        public static void orderLeaderBoard()
        orderLeaderBoard() sorts the leader board in descending order of points.
